_header: Thou most fort with weal or woe
Note: Second quatrain an alternative text to the medial couplet.
_description: On Fortune’s Wheel — ten lines. Written as prose inserted into Latin text, the Latin between couplets. Rough couplets and a quatrain, abab.

BLHar7322.First Lines: þou most fort wit wele or wobe þou lef oþer be þou lot…
BLHar7322.Last Lines: …bot ȝif þou falle & go amiswit dulful det i wonde þe sore
BLHar7322.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Political, Religious and Love Poems, from Lambeth MS. 306 and other
                sources.
